extendedInfo.description: This app does NOT:  - Boost you work productivity - Improve your sexual performance - Increase your success of getting laid on the first date - Decrease the possibility of being fired - Contain any girls, porn or sex material - Get you more friends in Facebook or Twitter - Improve your ability in sports, games  or other cool stuff that impresses other - Solve your money or health problems - Adds any widget although we tried to make one and failed - Accurately forecasts the weather (but doesn't get it wrong either)ONLY use this app in the following situation: - You have a cunning plan!

reviews.title: Worst app ever
reviews.comment: I haven\'t seen anything more stupid...
reviews.author: A Google User
